div.head: 大小便澀
div.div: major and minor relief with roughness; defecation and urination are rough

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: major and minor relief with roughness; defecation and urination are rough

sense.def: Illness Sign Combined Designation of xiao bian se 小便澀 , urination is rough, and da bian se 大便澀 , defecation is rough. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 46 : 熱搏水谷氣，蘊積成黃，蒸發於外，身疼 膊背強，大小便澀，皮膚、面目、齒爪皆黃 , “The heat pounds on the qi of water and grain. They accumulate and assume a yellow color. [Eventually, the heat] evaporates toward outside. The body aches; arms and back are stiff. Defecation and urination are rough . Skin, face and eyes, teeth and fingernails are all yellow”.
